entry.title: Armenian detainees remain in limbo as Azerbaijan unwilling to negotiate

media:group.media:title: Armenian detainees remain in limbo as Azerbaijan unwilling to negotiate
media:group.media:description:
๐ Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoฤan held a phone call to discuss regional issues and continued dialogue, despite lacking formal diplomatic ties. ๐ The fate of Armenian prisoners held by Azerbaijan remains a deeply challenging issue that has seen no progress, according to Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan. ๐ Former Karabakh president Samvel Shahramanian has faced repeated interrogations in Armenia amid speculation of government pressure to block his reelection and dismantle exiled Karabakh institutions. ๐ Pashinyan vs. the Church- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RT4nB4OtBFQ

entry.title: Pashinyan vs. the Church: A War of Words

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan vs. the Church: A War of Words
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the CivilNet podcast, political commentator Eric Hacopian breaks down the escalating war of words between Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and the Armenian Apostolic Church. While Hacopian acknowledges there are legitimate political critiques to be made of the church, he argues that Pashinyanโs deeply personal attacks, which rely on salacious and unverified gossip, cross a line. Hacopian frames the controversy as part of a broader trend: the global coarsening of political discourse driven by populism and the unfiltered nature of social media.

ีีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีคีกีทีฟีธึีด ีฝีธึึีกีถึีฅึีซ ีฟีกึีกีฎีดีกีถ ีฏีธีถีฟีฅึีฝีฟีธึีด ีดีฅีถึ ีขีกีญีพีธึีด ีฅีถึ ีพีซึีฟีธึีกีฌ ึ ีผีฅีกีฌ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ, ีธึีธีถึ ีญีธีฝีธึีตีฉีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปึ ีกีถีปึีบีฅีฟีถีฅึ ีฅีถ ีญีธึีกีถีธึีด, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ยซีีฅีฃีซีธีถยป ีฐีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ิผีกีธึึีก ิฒีกีฒีคีกีฝีกึีตีกีถีจึ ีีก ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีธึีด ีง ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ีดีฅีคีซีกีตีซ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซีถี ีถีทีฅีฌีธีพ, ีธึ ีฝีธึีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีถีฅึีธึีด ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีกีฏีฟีซีพีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีนีซ ีถีบีกีฝีฟีธึีด ีกีฏีฟีซีพ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถีจึ ีีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึีจ ีถีกึ ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีญีธีฝีธึีตีฉีถีฅึีซ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีดีฅีคีซีกีตีซ ีคีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ

ิตึึีกีถีซ ีีพีกีถีฟ ึ ีีซีฆีดีกีฉ ีคีบึีธึีถีฅึีซ ีกีพีกีฃ ีคีกีฝีกึีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีกีฒีปีซีฏีถีฅึีจ ีนีธึีฝ ีขึีธีถีฆีฅ ีดีฅีคีกีฌ ีฅีถ ีทีกีฐีฅีฌ ิตีพึีธีบีกีตีซ ีกีฒีปีซีฏีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฉีฅีดีกีฟีซีฏีกีตีซ ึ ีฌีซีดีบีซีกีคีกีตีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีตีถ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีง ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ิฟีธีฝีธีพีธีตีธึีดึ ีีฌีซีดีบีซีกีคีกีถ ีกีถึีฏีกึีพีธึีด ีง 2012-ีซึึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีถ ีกีตีฝ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีกีถีฃีกีด ีง ีดีกีฝีถีกีฏึีฅีฌึ
